fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.adaptableproperty

Class ApplicationVMAdaptable

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.applicationvm.ApplicationVM
        • fr.upmc.datacenter.software.step2.adaptableproperty.ApplicationVMAdaptable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.upmc.components.ComponentI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.ComponentImplementedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.OfferedI, fr.upmc.components.interfaces.RequiredI, ProcessorServicesNotificationConsumerI, PushModeControllingI, ApplicationVMManagementI, RequestSubmissionHandlerI, AdapterVMI, java.rmi.Remote
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationVMcoordinate

    public class ApplicationVMAdaptable
extends ApplicationVM
implements AdapterVMI
    Version:
    06.01.2018 this component ApplicationVMAdaptable is allocated cores on processors of a single computer and uses them to execute the submitted requests. It maintain a queue for requests waiting a core to become idle before beginning their execution. This class allows adapter entity to add new AllocatedCore to submit requests for execution
    Author:
    Hacene KASDI
